title: Kyoukai no Kanata: Idol Saiban! Mayoi Nagara mo Kimi wo Sabaku Tami
original_name: きょうかいのかなた アイドル裁判！～迷いながらも君を裁く民～
ending_song: "Pobi no Kaerimichi (ポビの帰り道)" by Ai Shindou (Yuri Yamaoka)
sinopse:
Each of the episodes will have the female main characters cast as Chibi Angels who hold a trial for a different character of the series. Akihito Kanbara will be the defendant for the first episode.

(Source: MAL News)
